summary: What is experimental film, and why is it called that? Artists and poet working in celluloid since before WWI have always found themselves in a no man's land. Excluded both from the art ... See full summary »
cast: Pip Chodorov|Ken Jacobs|Hans Richter|Stan Brakhage|Robert Breer|Peter Kubelka|Jonas Mekas|Stephan Chodorov|Len Lye|Maurice Lemaître|M.M. Serra|Michael Snow|Nam June Paik|Stan Vanderbeek|John Mhiripiri|Andy Warhol
title: Free Radicals: A History of Experimental Film
